name: Anger Of Peace 5
description:
Anger Of Peace 5 is an online multiplayer/offline single-player game. Players can choose multiplayer online games or single-player challenges against computer AI. The game mode supports Team Deathmatch (TMD) mode, which supports up to 10V10 people in a single round. In the game, players can use more than 30 kinds of firearms and various launchers or melee weapons, and can also choose more than 10 custom characters to join. Fight and have a qualified shooting feel. In addition, after obtaining the specified number of kills, you can call for helicopter air support or missile precision strikes.

Feature list



* First person shooter game
* Switch between first/third person
* Intense team deathmatch combat mode
* Rich weapons
* Drivable vehicles
* multiplayer game
*Kill reward

Control


WASD <------- move
Mouse <------- View
LeftShift <------- Run
Q <------- Change perspective
Tab <------- Scoreboard
LeftMouse <------- fire
RightMouse <------- Aim
Escape <------- Pause
F <------- melee shortcut key
